content: You are assuming to much, you jump to the conclusion that Hillary would start a World War III. Facts are, more people fear Trump will do just that. Hillary has handled peace talks for crying out loud, and Sanders has been against every single war we in. Trump on the other hand, deals with those that tend to start wars, his Secretary of Education is a relative of the man behind Blackwater, his Secretary of State Rex Tillerson is best friend with Putin, and again in one of the major reasons for war … oil.
